page.title: 15ADULT EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
course his pilot is German! {By Robbie }
My dad is an agricultural contractor. An agricultal contractor is a sort of farmer but he does not have any animals and he helps other farmers . The company name is written like this C.BOWYER & SON AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTOR TEL LAVINGTON 3230. My dad has 8 men working for him .We have 8 Ford tractors 3 new holland and 2 massey ferguson combines and 8 new holland silage and maize coppers.We also have 2 new holland square balers and 2 new holland round balers 8 warwick trailers and 2 Agilators.An agilator is a six wheel drive buggy which is a low ground pressure vehicle .You use it where the ground is wet
